pr_title: UnaryService for gRPC doesn't need `volatile` on StreamObserver

timeline.message:
UnaryService for gRPC doesn't need `volatile` on StreamObserver

see also: https://github.com/grpc/grpc-java/issues/6929

timeline.bodyText: This would be user error, so let's raise this to a hard check.
timeline.author: mtopolnik

replies.bodyText: grpc doesn't allow this, and throws exception. The only case would be if this observer was used for a non-unary service, whcih I think the signature wouldn't allow.
replies.author: cangencer
